message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I am comfortable with paying $10,500 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,800.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $10,200 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm getting close to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,400.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget and the value I perceive in the product, I would like to propose a price of $10,300 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to make one final compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,250.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. Based on our previous negotiations and considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $10,200 for the product.
